summary: Previous security issues were addressed with constant-time signature comparison and strict exp/iat/TTL validation.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: JWT signature compared with plain string equality (timing attack risk)
previous_issues_status.notes: Now uses length check and timingSafeEqual on buffers.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Missing exp/iat/TTL validation allowing long-lived tokens
previous_issues_status.notes: Now enforces exp/iat presence, future iat rejection, expiration, and 5-minute TTL.
